title: (2) (20) Building Line along classified roads as mentioned in Regulation No
clause_text: (2) (20) Building Line along classified roads as mentioned in Regulation No.3.1.6 shall be applicable for residential buildings defined in Regulation No.1.3.93(i) and Control Line along classified roads shall be applicable for other uses or for commercial uses as mentioned in Regulation No.3.1.6 or for mixed use buildings where non-residential uses are proposed at least 50% or more of total proposed built-up area. The Provision in respect of minimum road width, minimum marginal distances etc., as given in Table No.6-E below shall apply for different categories of other buildings.
section: Marginal Distances and set-back for Residential Buildings and mixed use with Height up to
